entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0080.8482] ifrs-full:ProceedsFromContributionsOfNoncontrollingInterests has a value of -16,941,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProceedsFromContributionsOfNoncontrollingInterests fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500P8M3W2XX376054/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/covivio-2021-12-31-fr.zip/covivio-2021-12-31-fr/reports/covivio-2021-12-31-fr.xhtml 183957

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9627] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of -370,430,000 reported in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-320000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of 370,431,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.esma.europa.eu/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests : -3 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -3 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500P8M3W2XX376054/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/covivio-2021-12-31-fr.zip/covivio-2021-12-31-fr/reports/covivio-2021-12-31-fr.xhtml 183599
